original_title: UFC on ESPN 43: Vera vs. Sandhagen
overview: UFC on ESPN 43: Vera vs. Sandhagen was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on March 25, 2023, at the AT&T Center in San Antonio, Texas, United States. A bantamweight bout between Marlon Vera and former interim UFC Bantamweight Championship challenger Cory Sandhagen headlined the event.
title: UFC on ESPN 43: Vera vs. Sandhagen
